word_mean: 骨盆：位于躯干(尾)部，前壁和侧壁以两髋骨为界，后壁以骶骨及尾骨为界。骨盆由通过其界线的平面分为上方的假骨盆(大骨盆)和下方的真骨盆(小骨盆)。骨盆腔的上界称为骨盆入口、骨盆缘或骨盆上狭口。真骨盆下方以骨盆下狭口或出口为限，以尾骨、耻骨联合和两侧坐骨为界。骨盆出口由尾骨肌、肛提肌和会阴筋膜所封闭，形成骨盆底部。骨盆的入口和出口各有三条重要的测量径，即前后径、斜径和横径。其相互关系使不同作者做出不同的分类类型，见diameter项下各条
各种不同类型的骨盆入口

sentence.Network_en: The single pyramid projects well into the renal pelvis.
sentence.Network_cn: 单个锥体明显凸入肾盂.

sentence.Network_en: Acute compression injury to the abdomen is frequently associated with the fractures of the pelvis.
sentence.Network_cn: 腹部的急性挤压损伤常伴有骨盆骨折.

sentence.Network_en: Primary squamous cell carcinoma of the renal pelvis is quite rare.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要原发性鳞状上皮细胞癌在上泌尿道系统是相当少见的疾病.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin, literally basin'

entry.def: Your pelvis is the wide, curved group of bones at the level of your hips.

means.word_mean: 1. the structure of the vertebrate skeleton supporting the lower limbs in humans and the hind limbs or corresponding parts in other vertebrates
2. a structure shaped like a funnel in the outlet of the kidney into which urine is discharged before passing into the ureter
